name: NakedBacteria
body:
### Welcome to NakedBacteria
Bacteria do a lot with a little. 

NakedBacteria is a project in R and Shiny that makes it possible to see where genes reside on bacterial chromosomes and compare gene content as well as [gene synteny] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Synteny) across many closely-related bacterial strains.

Here is an example examining the 11 fully sequenced *Dehalococcoides mccartyi* strains 

![](https://github.com/koshlan/NakedBacteria/blob/master/demo_image.png?raw=true)

### Support or Contact
NakedBacteria is a project by Koshlan Mayer-Blackwell who can be reached at koshlan@stanford.edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
